mutants.code:
import re

def common_characters(str1, str2):
    str1 = re.sub('', '', str1)
    str1 = re.sub('\\d+', '', str1)
    str2 = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', str2)
    str2 = re.sub('\\d+', '', str2)
    set1 = set(str1)
    set2 = set(str2)
    common = set1.intersection(set2)
    return len(common)

import re

def common_characters(str1, str2):
    str1 = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', str1)
    str1 = re.sub('\\d+', '', str1)
    str2 = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', str2)
    str2 = re.sub('\\d+', '', str2)
    set1 = set(str1)
    set2 = set(str2)
    common = set1.intersection(set2)
    return len(common)

import re

def common_characters(str1, str2):
    str1 = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', str1)
    str1 = re.sub('\\d+', '', str1)
    str2 = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', str2)
    str2 = re.sub('\\d+', 'MUTATED', str2)
    set1 = set(str1)
    set2 = set(str2)
    common = set1.intersection(set2)
    return len(common)
